text: Anata wa, tenchi ni aru subete no mono o arra ga shitte ora reru koto o shiranai no ka. 3-Ri de himitsu no sodan o shite mo kare wa 4 hitome ni tsuneni ori, 5-ri no toki mo kare-ra no 6 hitome ni tsuneni ora reru. Sore yori sukunakute mo mata okute mo, kare-ra ga doko ni iyoutomo, kare hakare-ra to tomoni ora reru. Sorede shinpan no hi ni wa, kare hakare-ra no okonatta koto o, kare-ra ni tsuge rareru. Hontoni arra wa subete no koto o jukuchi nasa reru
